Portfolio

CJ Li

MA Drawing · Research Units 1–3

This site rebuilds every submission from Units 1–3 into a single, navigable structure. Each page carries over the original writing while using a consistent layout, so statements, reflections, and work notes can be referenced without opening separate folders.

Use the cards below to jump straight to the relevant unit pages, or browse the highlights for a snapshot of the most recent developments.
